description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、编剧、监制及演员，香港电影新浪潮的重要人物之一。祖籍中国广东省海丰县，生于越南西贡市。其作品开创了“新武侠”电影，并多次获得金马奖、香港电影金像奖及中国电影金鸡奖的最佳导演奖。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director, screenwriter, producer, and actor, and one of the key figures in the Hong Kong New Wave. His ancestral home is in Haifeng County, Guangdong, China, and he was born in Saigon, Vietnam. His works pioneered the 'new wuxia' genre, and he has won Best Director awards at the Golden Horse Awards, Hong Kong Film Awards, and Golden Rooster Awards multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影制片人，徐克前妻，与徐克共同创立了电影工作室。
description.en: A Hong Kong film producer, former wife of Tsui Hark, and co-founder of Film Workshop with him.

description.zh-cn: 由徐克和施南生于1984年成立的电影公司。
description.en: A film production company founded by Tsui Hark and Nansun Shi in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 越南的城市，徐克的出生地。
description.en: A city in Vietnam, birthplace of Tsui Hark.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港九龙城的中学，徐克的母校。
description.en: A secondary school in Kowloon City, Hong Kong, and Tsui Hark's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国德克萨斯州的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Dallas, Texas, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国德克萨斯州奥斯汀市的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Austin, Texas, United States.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费无线电视台。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港已倒闭的电视台，徐克曾在此担任编导。
description.en: A defunct television station in Hong Kong where Tsui Hark once worked as a director.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物及前电视行政人员。曾安排徐克进入无线电视工作。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and former television executive. She arranged for Tsui Hark to join TVB.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、监制、出品人。因赏识徐克的才华，让其执导了成名作《蝶变》。
description.en: Hong Kong film director, producer, and presenter. He recognized Tsui Hark's talent and let him direct his breakout film 'The Butterfly Murders'.

description.zh-cn: 指1970年代末至1980年代中，香港电影界涌现出的一批新锐导演及其作品的电影运动。
description.en: A film movement in Hong Kong cinema that emerged from the late 1970s to the mid-1980s, characterized by a group of new, innovative directors and their works.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，执导了由徐克监制的电影《英雄本色》。
description.en: Hong Kong film director, who directed the film 'A Better Tomorrow' produced by Tsui Hark.

description.zh-cn: 1986年上映的香港动作片，由吴宇森执导，徐克监制，是香港电影的经典之作。
description.en: A 1986 Hong Kong action film directed by John Woo and produced by Tsui Hark, considered a classic of Hong Kong cinema.

description.zh-cn: 1987年上映的香港爱情奇幻电影，由程小东执导，徐克监制。
description.en: A 1987 Hong Kong romantic fantasy film directed by Ching Siu-tung and produced by Tsui Hark.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、武术指导，徐克的长期合作伙伴。
description.en: Hong Kong film director and action choreographer, a long-term collaborator of Tsui Hark.

description.zh-cn: 香港女歌手、演员。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actress.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的综合性娱乐集团，与徐克合作拍摄了《狄仁杰》系列等电影。
description.en: A comprehensive entertainment group in mainland China that collaborated with Tsui Hark on films such as the 'Detective Dee' series.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的民营电影发行公司，与徐克合作拍摄了《龙门飞甲》等电影。
description.en: A private film distribution company in mainland China that collaborated with Tsui Hark on films like 'The Flying Swords of Dragon Gate'.

description.zh-cn: 华语影视男演员、武术运动员，与徐克合作了《黄飞鸿》系列等多部电影。
description.en: Chinese film actor and martial artist who collaborated with Tsui Hark on numerous films, including the 'Once Upon a Time in China' series.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、演员、监制。
description.en: Hong Kong film director, actor, and producer.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影女演员。
description.en: Taiwanese film actress.

description.zh-cn: 徐克与施南生于1996年结婚，2014年施南生宣布二人已离婚。
description.en: Tsui Hark and Nansun Shi married in 1996, and Shi announced in 2014 that they had divorced.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，徐克与时为妻子的施南生共同组建了电影工作室。
description.en: In 1984, Tsui Hark and his then-wife Nansun Shi co-founded Film Workshop.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，施南生与时为丈夫的徐克共同组建了电影工作室。
description.en: In 1984, Nansun Shi and her then-husband Tsui Hark co-founded Film Workshop.

description.zh-cn: 徐克曾在美国德克萨斯州的南方卫理会大学修读艺术，但未毕业。
description.en: Tsui Hark studied art at Southern Methodist University in Texas, USA, but did not graduate.

description.zh-cn: 徐克于1975年毕业于德州大学奥斯丁分校电影制作专业。
description.en: Tsui Hark graduated from the University of Texas at Austin with a degree in film production in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 1976年回港后，徐克在电视广播有限公司（无线电视）担任编导。
description.en: After returning to Hong Kong in 1976, Tsui Hark worked as a director at Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB).

description.zh-cn: 1978年，徐克随周梁淑怡转往佳艺电视担任编导。
description.en: In 1978, Tsui Hark followed Selina Chow to Commercial Television to work as a director.

description.zh-cn: 在周梁淑怡的安排下进入无线电视担任编导，后随其转往佳艺电视。
description.en: Entered TVB as a director under Selina Chow's arrangement, and later followed her to Commercial Television.

description.zh-cn: 吴思远赏识徐克的才华，让其在他的电影公司执导了成名作《蝶变》。
description.en: Ng See-yuen recognized Tsui Hark's talent and had him direct his breakout film 'The Butterfly Murders' at his production company.

description.zh-cn: 徐克是香港电影新浪潮的重要代表人物之一，其作品推动了该运动的发展。
description.en: Tsui Hark is one of the key representatives of the Hong Kong New Wave, and his works contributed to the development of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 徐克在电视台工作时曾提出《英雄本色》的方案，但遭到拒绝。
description.en: When Tsui Hark worked at the TV station, he proposed the project 'A Better Tomorrow', but it was rejected.

description.zh-cn: 徐克在电视台工作时曾提出《倩女幽魂》的方案，但遭到拒绝。
description.en: When Tsui Hark worked at the TV station, he proposed the project 'A Chinese Ghost Story', but it was rejected.

description.zh-cn: 徐克担任电影《英雄本色》的监制。
description.en: Tsui Hark served as the producer for the film 'A Better Tomorrow'.

description.zh-cn: 吴宇森担任电影《英雄本色》的导演。
description.en: John Woo served as the director for the film 'A Better Tomorrow'.

description.zh-cn: 徐克与程小东是长期合作伙伴，两人在电视台时期相识，此后经常在片厂讨论武术设计，并合作了《倩女幽魂》等多部电影。
description.en: Tsui Hark and Ching Siu-tung are long-term collaborators. They met during their time at the TV station, often discussed martial arts design on set, and collaborated on films like 'A Chinese Ghost Story'.

description.zh-cn: 1993年，徐克与叶蒨文传出绯闻，据称这导致了他与施南生的分手。
description.en: In 1993, Tsui Hark was rumored to have an affair with Sally Yeh, which reportedly led to his separation from Nansun Shi.

description.zh-cn: 自2009年以来，徐克与中国内地的华谊兄弟合作，拍摄了《狄仁杰之通天帝国》等电影。
description.en: Since 2009, Tsui Hark has collaborated with Mainland China's Huayi Brothers on films such as 'Detective Dee and the Mystery of the Phantom Flame'.

description.zh-cn: 自2009年以来，徐克与中国内地的博纳影业合作，拍摄了《龙门飞甲》和《智取威虎山》等电影。
description.en: Since 2009, Tsui Hark has collaborated with Mainland China's Bona Film Group on films such as 'The Flying Swords of Dragon Gate' and 'The Taking of Tiger Mountain'.

description.zh-cn: 徐克与李连杰是长期合作伙伴（老搭档），合作拍摄了《黄飞鸿》系列、《龙门飞甲》等多部经典电影。
description.en: Tsui Hark and Jet Li are long-term collaborators ('old partners'), having worked together on many classic films including the 'Once Upon a Time in China' series and 'The Flying Swords of Dragon Gate'.

description.zh-cn: 徐克执导、周星驰监制了2017年上映的电影《西游伏妖篇》。
description.en: Tsui Hark directed and Stephen Chow produced the 2017 film 'Journey to the West: The Demons Strike Back'.

description.zh-cn: 徐克与林青霞曾多次合作，林青霞主演了徐克执导的《刀马旦》等电影。林青霞将于2025年为徐克颁发香港电影金像奖终身成就奖。
description.en: Tsui Hark and Brigitte Lin have collaborated multiple times, with Lin starring in films directed by Tsui such as 'Peking Opera Blues'. Lin is set to present the Lifetime Achievement Award to Tsui at the Hong Kong Film Awards in 2025.
